title: Pawperty Damage
description:
Oh no, you’ve turned into a giant and the more you destroy, the more you grow What to do? Maybe you should find a way to shrink back to normal size Wait, NO. This is your chance: It’s payback time Summer Trip Cruise
This has been my passion project for the past 2.5 years, developed entirely in my spare time. Pawperty Damage is a small game for big players, but a big game for a small developer I want to thank my friends and all the wonderful people who have helped and supported me—hope you enjoy
